overview: Nightlife in Paris. The always welcome Laure Sainclair stars as a beautiful hooker who bears more than a slight resemblance to a wealthy business-woman. This leads to all kinds of erotic entanglements... Exquisite set design, sexy underwear, steaming sex and - best of all - Laure Sainclair, carnal desire in person.
tagline: Laure Sainclair. It's time to see what's left the rest of the world breathless… and begging for more.
title: The First Lady
